page.title: 06Education
page.content: The work we do in Broadwindsor School is fun.Class 3 (my class) has a timetable which we keep to.The work we do is sometimes{Ginn Maths.}The maths is fun.We do{Creative Writing.}That is a mixture of things.We don't work from a book.Mr.Wansey (our teacher) gives us things to do. We often write stories about different subjects.We do {R.E.}That stands for Religious Education.We have{English}from Junior English books.We do{Spellings, {Handwriting, Science}and a{Tables Test every Friday morning during Maths. We also do alot of{Sports}and{Swimming}in the summer. We do a school play every Christmas. The play is not always to do with Christmas. We do{Drama}as well, that is good fun.
